summary: A requirements meeting was started by Sarah to initiate project naming; the PM asked for the project name but no other attendees provided input. Next step is to obtain a proposed project name and confirm it with absent stakeholders.

actions.task: Propose and confirm an official project name

backlog_deltas.title: Create backlog item to decide and record the official project name

risks.risk: Key roles (Architect, Developer, QA) did not provide input, risking incomplete requirements and delayed decisions.
risks.mitigation: Follow up with absent stakeholders to solicit input and schedule a short decision meeting or asynchronous poll to finalize the project name.
